001package squidpony.examples;
002
003import squidpony.squidmath.DharmaRNG;
004import squidpony.squidmath.LightRNG;
005import squidpony.squidmath.SobolQRNG;
006
007/**
008 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 5/2/2015.
009 */
010public class DharmaTest {
011    public static void main(String[] args) {
012        for(int d = 1; d < 20; d++)
013        {
014            long sum = 0l;
015            System.out.println("\nFairness: " + (d * 0.05));
016            DharmaRNG sq = new DharmaRNG(new LightRNG(d * 0xbabe), d * 0.05);
017            int result;
018            for(int c = 0; c < 100; c++)
019            {
020                result = sq.nextInt(100);
021                sum += result;
022                System.out.print(result + " "); // System.out.print(result + "(" + sq.getFortune() + ") ");
023            }
024            System.out.println("\nTotal: " + sum);
025            System.out.println("Average for this many calls: " + (50 * 100));
026        }
027    }
028}
